original: mā bhaiṣṭa nāsti vaḥ pāpaṃsamayo duratikramaḥ // Cvp_112 //
analyzed: mā bhaiṣṭa na asti vaḥ pāpaṃsamayaḥ duratikramaḥ
mantra saṃskṛta kāṣṭha ādi deva tvam adhigacchati

original: kiṃ punaḥ jñānavān kāyaḥkaṣṭaṃ mohaviceṣṭitam // Cvp_113 //
analyzed: kim punar jñānavān kāyaḥ kaṣṭam moha viceṣṭitam
prākṛta tvam ahaṅkāram parityajya samāhitaḥ
prajñā upāya vidhānena kriyām imām samācaret
paṅka jātam yathā padmam paṅka doṣaiḥ na lipyate
vikalpa vāsanā doṣaiḥ tathā yogī na lipyate
vikalpaḥ vimba saṅkāśaḥ dṛṣṭi doṣaiḥ na lipyate
anbhasā lipyate na eva yadvat udaka candramāḥ
anādi vāsanā paṅkaiḥ viliptam citta ratnakam
prajñā upāya jalena eva kṣālitam samprakāśate
sva adhidevata yogasya asthira cittasya dhīmataḥ
muktaḥ kudṛṣṭi meghaiḥ ca bhāsate citta bhāskaraḥ
prajñā lakṣma paricchede bhūta arthasya viniścayāt
dharmadhātuḥ upādeyaḥ vidyā vyatyaya varjanāt
prakṛtyāḥ nirmalaḥ svacchaḥ jñāna dīpaḥ prakāśate
su prasiddhāni
kriyante hi anyathā vijñaiḥ mantra sāmarthya yogataḥ
sarva vādam parityajya mantra vādam samācaret
yasya sidhyati
triratnam na parityājyam bodhi cittam tathā guruḥ
na vadhyāḥ prāṇinaḥ ke pisa mayāni api adhiṣṭhayet
madhu raktam sa karpūram raktacandana yojitam
muni vajra udakam ca eva pañca etāni api adhiṣṭhayet
anyaiḥ ca samayaiḥ divyaiḥ cittasya utkarṣa kārakaiḥ
na aśuci bhāva āśaṅkyaḥ vikalpya yoga līlayā
samāyuktena cittena mantrī sarvam samācaret
makṣikā pada mātreṇa viṣeṇa api abhibhūyate
aṇu mātrā ghṛṇā śaṅkā mṛtyu kaṣṭena saṃyutā
su yuddham vā ācaret vijñaḥ su palāyanam eva vā
āntarālika bhāvaḥ tu vyarthaḥ u vai patanam bhavet
guroḥ ājñām ca mudrām ca chāyām api na laṅghayet

original: guṇāstasya paraṃ grāhyā doṣānaiva kadācana // Cvp_129 //
analyzed: guṇāḥ tasya param grāhyāḥ doṣān na eva kadācana
ācāryaḥ paramaḥ devaḥ pūjanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ
svayam vajradharaḥ rājā asākṣāt rūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ
yathā udaka maṇiḥ śuddhaḥ kaluṣa udaka śodhakaḥ
śraddhāmaṇiḥ tathā proktaḥ citta ratna viśodhakaḥ
śraddhāvān muhyate
utpādayet atas prajñām āgama adhigama ātmikām
śrāddhaḥ bahu śrutaḥ prājñaḥ prakṛtyā karuṇā ātmakaḥ
jagat duḥkha vināśāya sukha upāyam sa vindati
citta viśuddhim ādhāya yat mayā upārjitam sukham
citta viśuddhim ādhāya tena astu sukhitaḥ janaḥ
kṛtiḥ iyam ārya deva pādānām iti
